problem_text: Find E G if \triangle A C B \sim \triangle E G F, A D is an altitude of \triangle A C B, E H is an altitude of \triangle E G F, A C = 17, A D = 15, and E H = 7.5.
compact_text: Find EG if \triangle ACB \sim \triangle EGF, AD is an altitude of \triangle ACB, EH is an altitude of \triangle EGF, AC = 17, AD = 15, and EH = 7.5.
annotat_text: Find $E G$ if $\triangle A C B \sim \triangle E G F, \overline{A D}$ is an altitude of $\triangle A C B, \overline{E H}$ is an altitude of $\triangle E G F, A C=17$, $A D=15,$ and $E H=7.5$
